Row.Text: The Cataphract is a Byzantine unique unit, replacing the Horseman. Cataphracts are more powerful than the Horseman unit, making them one of the most dangerous cavalry units until the arrival of the Knight. They can move after attacking. They are able to gain defensive bonuses, unlike the Horseman. Also their penalty for attacking cities is not as severe.
